name: Frog in the Lab Coat
description:
Action-puzzle platformer. Make your way through a dangerous laboratory run by AI. Use the character's ability to eat large objects and spit them at enemies! Solve puzzles with dangerous obstacles like spikes and automatic turrets!

Demo is Available now!

A demo version of the game is currently available. In the future, as development progresses, everything can change. A variety of stuff from this list will be added:

- Automatic turrets

- Edible bombs

- Edible turrets

- More logical elements for puzzles

- Portals

- Lasers

- Living robot-enemies with guns!

- More cool ways to die

Join the Discord Community: https://discord.gg/tpKFzypDUF
